heading: HR01071
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR A HOUSE INQUIRY INTO THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT'S ASSESSMENT OF AND RESPONSE TO THE ONGOING DIPLOMATIC ROW BETWEEN THE STATE OF QATAR AND THREE GULF COUNTRIES, NAMELY THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES, BAHRAIN, AND FOUR ALLIED ISLAMIC STATES, NAMELY: EGYPT, LIBYA, THE MALDIVES AND YEMEN THAT MAY AFFECT THE LIVES OF THOUSANDS OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS, IN AID OF LEGISLATION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2017-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01071
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR A HOUSE INQUIRY INTO THE PHILIPPINE GOVERNMENT'S ASSESSMENT OF AND RESPONSE TO THE ONGOING DIPLOMATIC ROW BETWEEN THE STATE OF QATAR AND THREE GULF COUNTRIES, NAMELY THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES, BAHRAIN, AND FOUR ALLIED ISLAMIC STATES, NAMELY: EGYPT, LIBYA, THE MALDIVES AND YEMEN THAT MAY AFFECT THE LIVES OF THOUSANDS OF OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS, IN AID OF LEGISLATION AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BERTIZ, ANICETO "JOHN" III D.
DATE FILED : 2017-06-07
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2017-08-01
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-07-25;
